rules_text:
Archive 1 [i](As this enters, shuffle the top card of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top three cards of your main library. Put one of them back on top and the others on the bottom of the archived library in any order. Then if the top card of the archived library is a land card, put it into your hand.
